total.description: The total number of pages in pagination.

boundaries.description: Number of elements visible on the left/right edges.

colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

component.description: The pagination button component to use.

controlNextProps.description: Props for next of the control button element.

controlPrevProps.description: Props for previous of the control button element.

defaultPage.description:
The initial page of the pagination.
Should be less than `total` and greater than `1`.

edgeFirstProps.description: Props for first of the edge button element.

edgeLastProps.description: Props for last of the edge button element.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the pagination all item will be disabled.

onChange.description: The callback invoked when the page changes.

page.description:
The page of the pagination.
Should be less than `total` and greater than `1`.

siblings.description: Number of siblings displayed on the left/right side of selected page.
